subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Munich received support yesterday for a 2018 Olympic bid when Germany’s Olympic sports federation voted unanimously to support it. Munich was the host for the 1972 Summer Olympics, which were scarred by an attack on Israeli athletes.
